itemDisplayName: Deploy a managed Kubernetes Cluster (AKS) into an existing Vnet.
description: This ARM template deploys an AKS instance with advanced networking features into an existing virtual network. Additionally, the chosen Service Principal is assigned the Network Contributor role against the subnet that contains the AKS cluster.
